subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Rajon Rondo had 18 points and 8 assists, outplaying the new Pistons acquisition Allen Iverson and leading the Boston Celtics to a 98-80 victory over Detroit on Thursday.
snippet: Rajon Rondo had 18 points and 8 assists, outplaying the new Pistons acquisition Allen Iverson and leading the Boston Celtics to a 98-80 victory over Detroit on Thursday.
